Kuviar began to mutter a spell under his breath.
Tea awoke and saw Kuviar.

"What are you....?" started Tea.

"BE EVIL!" said Kuviar, pointing to Tea.

Tea smiles at Kuviar, and picks him up. Tea licks her lips.

"No! Don't eat me!" said Kuviar. "eat..."

13211112.title: The end of Kuviar?

choices: Yugi and co. go into hiding.
Yugi and co. call for help
132111121.content:
Tea smashes the roof of the castle. The crashing noise was so loud; it awakens Yugi and co., especially Pegasus and his guards. <<Tea, what are you doing?>> yelled Yugi. Tea growled. <<What is the meaning of this?>> Pegasus screams in astonishment. Tea smashed the entire castle until there was no room left for everyone to seek shelter.

Tea licks her lips. She evilly glares at Pegasus and his men, as one by one, she eats them all. Witnessing the sight of the horror she has brought upon Pegasus’s Castle, Yugi and co. had two choices on their hand: either they scatter throughout the island or call for help in distant civilization.
132111121.title: Smashed!

choices: Tea wakes up her friends and tells them what happened
1321112.content:
Pegesus' Courtyard...

"BE EVIL!" Kuvar yelled. A black light shot out of his outstreched hand and hit Tea in the face. Her eyes began to go black...and then turned back to normal. She blinked. "What was that?" she asked. Kuviar looked in shock at Tea. 'What? Why didn't it-Damnit! She must be so big that she's resistant to a puny spell like that, I should have put more magic into it, but I was too tired after the growth spell. Curse it all...' Kuviar thought. He looked up at the giant Tea. "Until next time, Tea!" he shouted. He threw some stones at the ground and there was a flash of blinding light. When it had faded, Kuviar was gone.
1321112.title: Failure!

choices: Find out what Kuviar is doing
13211121.content:
It was morning at Duelist Kingdom. Tea was the first one to awake. The sun had just risen and birds were singing. Tea's stomach growled.
"Takes a lot of food to feed a giantess" said Tea, giggling to herself.
Pegasus had brought out breakfast for Tea earlier. There was enough food to feed an entire army. Tea smiled and began to eat; she ate a full plate of eggs whole, then she ate a plate full of bacon whole. She was starting on the milk that was in an oil barrel, when Yugi came out of the castle and into the courtyard. Yugi saw the mountain of food that Tea was eating. Tea hadn't noticed him come out. Yugi just watched in stunned silence as Tea ate and ate. Man, that girl can eat! If Tea had been normal size, Yugi was sure her belly would've filled the entire courtyard with the amount of food she was eating now.
Finally, Tea noticed Yugi.
"Good Morning, Yugi" said Tea.
"Good morning, Tea" said Yugi.
Tea leaned back and sighed. She had finally finished eating. There wasn't much of her food left. She patted her full belly.
"Tea," said Yugi. "I wonder why Kuviar done this to you"
"I wondered that myself" said Tea. "I mean, I had fantasies of me being a giant, but I didn't actually want to become one"
"Yeah" said Yugi. "being a giant must not be easy"
13211121.title: In The Morning

choices: Kuviar shows up and takes the tape away
132111212.content:
Tea and Yugi talked to each other until the sun was high in the sky. Then, Pegasus came out to the courtyard.

"Little Yugi," said Pegasus. "it seems that like you have a package"

Pegasus handed Yugi a plain brown box with "TO YUGI" written in big letters.

Curious, Yugi opened the box. In the box was a VHS tape and a small blue stone. Yugi pulled out the blue stone. It was bright blue and shiny. Next, he took the VHS tape out of the box and looked on it. On the tape, somebody had written "Watch Me" in very bad handwritting.
Yugi shrugged and went into the castle to watch the tape.
132111212.title: The Plot Thickens

Kuviar comes and destroys the tape before it can finish

Pegesus' Castle...

Yugi had gotten everyone in his room to watch the tape. Tea was looking through a window. "Ok everyone, heer we go." Yugi said, putting the movie in and sitting down. The T.V. began to flicker and a dark shape came into view. "Yugi Moto. I hope you're watching this. I have very little time in my life now, and this is one of the last things that I will ever do. You're in Duelist Kingdom now, correct? There should be a man named 'Kuviar' there. DO NOT DUEL HIM! He will try to twist one of you to his will. The person he's trying to control is-" the man on the video had been talking, but he was cut off by a gunshot. The figure fell to the floor, and the tape ended. Everyone looked at the now blue screen.

Pegasus' Castle


The videotape had been blue for a full two mnitues when it started up again. Ths time, a man with an eye-patch over his left eye was on the screen. The man also had burn scars all over the left side of his face.
"....Where was he?" asked the man to someone off-camera. "Oh yeah....The one that Kuviar is trying to control is---"

Suddenly, an episode of "Friends" begins. Yugi and the others fall down anime style.

"Maybe this is a clue" said Joey. "maybe it's one of our friends Kuviar is trying to control"

"Wow, Joey" said Tristen. "you are smart, man"
"Just call me "Sherlock Joey" !" said Joey, suddenly dressed as Sherlock Holmes. His pipe is blowing bubbles though.

Mai Valentine walked into the courtyard to find the giant Tea. Tea had her back to Mai. (I really envy Mai!)

Tea tells Mai what happened.

Kuviar's face was covered with cuts and bruises, as were his arms and his legs. His once fine clothes had been torn and he had leaves in his hair. He began to limp towards Yugi, who began to back away. Kuviar stopped about a foot form Yugi. "...Yugi...Moto...need... your...help...mind...control...taking over...my body...danger...magic...items...ring...Jerome...
need your...help..." Kuviar whispered, grabbing Yugi's shirt. Then he stopped and stood up, smirking. "Sorry about that. He's been acting very...resistant lately." Jerome said, stepping out of the shadows cast by Tea. "Who are you?" Tea said, looking at him.

"I am many things, young lady" said Jerome.

"First off, what's with the face?" asked Joey, pointing to the burn scars on Jerome's face"

"I was in a fire when I was young" said Jerome. "I was trying to save my younger brother, Erik. I managed to save him, at the cost of this eye-patch"

"Who are you?" asked Yugi.

"I'm Jerome Johnson" said Jerome. "does that help you?"

"Sort of" said Yugi. "you are the older brother of the famous Johnson brothers. You two are the top duelist in America. You may give Seto Kaiba a run for his money"

"I've been after him for some time" said Jerome.

The courtyard...

How dare you rob me of my revenge!" he shouted, trying to get out of Tea's grasp. "Oh, shut up." she said. Kuviar stopped struggling. "But of course." he said. Yugi knew that Jerome was hiding something. He wasn't sure what, but something told Yugi that Jerome wasn't telling the whole truth.

In order to stop the submarine, she decided to take off her pants to reveal her bare ass. She dragged the submarine close to her, sat down, and her butthole started to widen. "All right,if I can't beat you right, I will have to play dirty!" Tea remarked sleasily.

She plopped a turd on it with tremendous force that it broke through the sub and killed the bad guys.

The day was saved in a disgusting, but Satisfying way.

The End (Quite Literally)

"This side-effect goes away?" asked Tristen.

"A few hours" said Jerome.

"Pick me! Pick me!!!" he yelled, now sitting (actually floating) at a school desk, with his hand raised. Everyone sighed.

Then, if that doesn't work, we could-" Wizard began, but Tea stopped him.

"How about...NO!!!" everyone shouted.

One of the IPDs that Wizard had thrown into the ocean earlier finally came in contact with the water, and POOF!, an enormous submarine appeared. The sub was easily 150 ft. high and 1000 ft. long, so there wouldn't be any problem for the two giantesses.

"How convenient," Assassin said.

Everyone sweatdropped.

"Hey, Wizard, mind giving me one of those IPDs? I... ah... need to create some chaos," Drez said after crossing over to where mini-Wizard was.

"Huh... well, I'm running low, but if it's for chaos..." Wizard handed over one of his IPDs to Drez, who dipped it into the ocean.

"Thanks... now just a second..." Drez produced a small amount of rope from his pocket, then went back over to Wizard, who was by now a little nervous.

"Hey, what're you doing with... no, I'm fine, don't... HEY, that was uncalled for, I outta... stop, don't, I'll sue!!" Wizard's protests became more shrill and insistent as Drez finished his work. Tea looked over Drez to investigate.

"What did you do to him?"

"I just tied him up and stuck him in this cage. He's had enough fun for now, and I'd prefer to have him somewhere where he can't get to any water without someone watching him."

"Just wait until I get out of this, I'll..."

"Oops, forgot something..." Drez mumbled to himself as he opened the cage again and pulled something else out of his pocket.

"What's that, don't come near..."

*Striiiiiiiiip*

*Rip*

"MMMMMMPH!! UMMPH!! MMF!"

"Forgot to duct tape his mouth shut," Drez explained, brushing his hands together like he'd just finished a major construction project.

Yami-Yugi approached him. "What if he needs something to eat or drink?"

Drez scratched the back of his head. "Ah... I didn't really think about that, heh heh." Everyone fell on their faces, anime-style.

"Anyway, onward, to Atlantis!" shouted Drez, placing one foot on a rock and pointing out into the distance dramatically.

"Which way is Atlantis again?"

"... I thought you knew."

Everyone face-faulted, again.

1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
Drez walked up to them calmly. "Now, now, I think that there's been a misunderstanding here..." he said with his hands in a non-aggressive gesture.

"Hey! That non-aggressive gesture looked to me like you wanna fight!" shouted Buttercup, raising her fingerless, ball-like hands and getting ready to fight.

Bubbles and Blossom sweatdropped. "Umm, Buttercup, cool your jets for a minute." Blossom said, turning to Drez. "We just wanna know where we are, why we are here, and why those two over there are the only people our size," she stated, pointing at Rikku and Tea.

"I'd like to know that too..." Drez said. "I know that we don't have anything except for those IPDs that Wizard has that could bring you into this story... and he's all tied up... unless..." Drez turned over to Wizard, whom had somehow undone his bonds. He was holding a jar in one hand and a plastic IPD wrapper in the other. He also wore an insane grin on his face.

"I knew that saving all my excess saliva would pay off one day!" Wizard said, his eyes aglow with insane success.

Drez smacked his forehead. "Can we get something like a straightjacket and a muzzle in here!?" he demanded of the people around him.

Then, someone stepped out of the shadows. First, the person's electric blue hair appeared, followed by the lank figure clad in a white t-shirt and blue jeans with a scar on his right cheek. It was Badrick.

"Here ya go," he said nonchalantly, handing the requested items to Drez.

Drez blinked at him a few times. Then, realization dawned on him. "Oh, you!" Then his face became puzzled. "You're still in this interactive?"

Badrick's face conveyed slight hurt. "Hey, I may be new, but I AM making additions, aren't I?"

Drez ignored him as he bound Wizard up again, this time rather tightly. A thundering tap-tap-tap sound coming from a foot being tapped against the ground him reminded that the Powerpuff girls still needed taken care of.

"Ah, well, Wizard here summoned you into this story, so you can either have him or go with us to Domino city. The choice is up to you."

The girls though it over, before deciding...

1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
After about another fifteen minutes, the crew arrived at Domino City. They all got out of the sub and headed towards the city... when they were stopped.

"Mmmmphf, mmmpf mmf mf mph ommmph mmmmf mmmmmf." said Assassin, who's mouth was still duct taped shut.

"What're you talking about," said Badrick, "I'm on the ground. YOU'RE the one walking on the ceiling... wait, how did there get to be ceiling outside?"

Everyone looked around. Sure enough, there was Domino city, but it resembled an M. C. Esher painting more than a city, with no certain placement of objects or even where to stand.

"What's going on here?" said Mai. Even though she had just exited the sub, she was standing sideways a few feet from Rikku's head.

Drez scowled. "Something got here before us..." Just then, a sound could be heard coming towards them. Joey, Drez, Assassin, and Badrick all took fighting stances in front of the others as the sound got closer. Finally, something came into view. It appears to be several items, shaped in the form of various musical instruments, yet something was wrong. They bounced on the ground, and the way the part that hit the ground depressed, the instruments had to be made of a very pliable substance.

"What're those?!" yelled Joey, alarmed.

"I..." Drez started, but trailed off. His head bowed down, and he started shaking.

Joey approached him. "Don't get scared now, what is it?"

Drez turned to Joey. "It's... a rubber band." When Drez turned, it came to light that he was not scared, but that he was in fact laughing.

Everyone stared at him. Then, suddenly, everyone else started laughing.

Assassin was the first to stop, maybe because he had duct tape over his mouth. "Mmmmph mmph mmf fmmf?"

"I don't know," came Drez's reply through several whooping laughs. "I think some magic is effecting us and making us laugh..."

"That's right!!" cried out a voice from atop a building that had a roof that seemed to touch the sky and the ground at the same time. The figure jumped down and touched the ground lightly, a cape billowing nicely behind him on the way down and covering him completely once he hit the ground.

"It's Wizard," exclaimed Yami-Yugi, "and he's full size again!.

"Yes, in the flesh, feathers, horns, claws, slime, scales, fins, and rusty old nails!" Wizard said with a grin. He produced a map out of his cloak and waved it in front of the party. "This is the map to Atlantis. If you want it, you'll have to take it from me."

By now, most of the gang had recovered from the laughing. "Alright, can we have the map?" asked Tristin.

"You aren't getting it that easily!"

"Pretty please?"

"No!"

"With a cherry on top?"

"Mmm... cherry... wait, stop distracting me, damnit!"

Rikku took over from here. "I'll expose myself to you if you will..." she said in a sultry voice, leaning over to expose a bit more of her massive cleavage for Wizard.

"No, no, no! I won't give it up without a fight!"

Drez's face turned grim. "Stay back, you guys. Only another author can take down an author."

"But I ate several earlier!" Tea protested.

"That wasn't in a fight, though. This is different." Badrick explained. "This looks dangerous, so this is a perfect opportunity... to see what you two can do." He finished, pushing Drez and Assassin forward before running back and hiding in the sub.

"Mmmmmf! Mmm mmmmf mmph ummph!" exclaimed Assassin.

"No, no, I think that it's more important that I see what you guys can do than me bleeding! You go on ahead! I'll give you a nice funeral if you don't make it!"

Tea grabbed into the submarine, gripped Badrick, and threw him back to the fight. "Get in there!" she snarled.

"Yes, mam'." Badrick replied meekly.

"Alright, now then..." Wizard started...

1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
(A.N. It's BADrick, not BARdick)

Just then, something rocked the ship. Almost everyone was thrown off his/her feet and hit the ground.

"What was that!?" cried out Tristin, who for some reason wasn't very comfortable being in a sub in the first place.

A whining sound that sounded an awful lot like the hull straining against something overpowered all over noise for the next several seconds.

"I have no idea," said Yami-Yugi after the noise died down, "but it probably wasn't a good thing..."

Assassin walked over to the window and looked out. "I don't see anything... but we definitely aren't going the right way."

Everyone went over to look and see what he meant. Sure enough, rather than moving forward they were being pulled to the side by some unknown force.

"Get to the front! Get us away from here!" shouted out Drez in a tone that carried absolute authority in it. (Get it? AUTHOR-ity? Eh heh heh... I'll shut up now.)

Joey, Mai, Assassin, and Tristin all ran to the front and took up various stations. After a few minutes, they shouted back.

"It's no use!" Joey yelled. "We're givin' the engine all she's got, an' we ain't movin' an inch!"

"Grr..." was all Drez said back.

Resigned to their current fate (and after violently objecting to Wizard's idea to use another IPD, after which he was in the same state as Wild Fang and Badrick), everyone waited in tension at the window to get a glimpse at what was pulling them in.

"I see something!" Yami-Yugi finally exclaimed.

It was...

1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.title: The Lawyers Strike Back

1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
"If we can't magic 'em, let's just smash 'em!" shouted Buttercup. She cocked back her fist in preparation of smashing it into the lawyer's puny body. The lawyers, however, seemed unconcerned.

"Feh, think we didn't come prepared for you giantesses?!" he demanded. The CopyRight Killer 5000 placed itself between the giantess and the lawyers.

"Your little toy isn't going to stop me." Buttercup snorted before sending her fist flying at the lawyer and his machine. However, when it came within a few feet of the machine, her fist shank down to microscopic size.

"What?!" Buttercup said in shock. She attempted to smash the lawyers several more times, only to have the same thing happen, even when she attacked from the side or behind the lawyers.

"Geh heh heh heh heh! Like our shrink field? It shrinks anything of disproportionate size down to a teeny tiny size. In other words, you can't smash us!" the lead lawyer said with glee. "And now, CopyRight Killer 5000, destroy..."

"WAIT!" a voice cried out.

"Huh?"

Everyone turned around to see Yami-Yugi, standing in his confidant stance.

"You may have nullified the authors and giantesses, but you are still in a story based on an anime, and you still have to abide by the rules of the anime, lawyer or not."

"Hmph. And what are those rules?"

In answer, Yugi thrust his arm forward, causing his arm dueling device to go into dueling mode. "You have to beat me at a game of Duel Monsters before you can destroy us."

"Whatever. Let's get it over with then." said the lead lawyer, who for some reason had a dueling device on his arm and a deck already.

"Why in the world does a lawyer have a deck and one of those dueling things?" Assassin whispered to Badrick.

"Everyone else in Yu-Gi-Oh has one, so why not a lawyer?" Badrick responded.

Both duelists shuffled their decks and put them in their devices, but not before Drez handed Yugi a card.

"If you get in a jam, use that card. It'll help." said Drez.

Yugi nodded.
1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.title: The law of the anime

choices: The impossible happens; Yami-Yugi is defeated!! Oh, the horror!!
1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
Yami-Yugi and the lead lawyer was drawing cards, when a booming voice came.

"WAIT!"

"Why should we wait?" asked Buttercup, who was looking for the soucre of the voice.

"Because I said so!" said the voice.

"And who are you?" asked Drez.

"I am your evil side, Dark Drez!" said the voice. "and I am not pleased of what I see"

"Eh?" asked Yugi.

"First off," said Dark Drez. "how's come the Powerpuff Girls are in a YU-GI-OH story?"

"Umm...beacuse we like the powerpuff girls" said the other authors.

"CAN'T WE JUST DUEL!" yelled the lead lawyer.

"...um, sure...I guess" said Dark Drez. Everybody fell over anime style.
1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.title: Dark Drez!

choices: Opee Sea Killer vs. The Heros
1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
Inside the sub...

Well, Yami-Yugi wins, as he always does. But you think the lawyers banished? Think again...

"Well, you may have defeated us in a game of cards..." the head lawyer began, sneering.

"PENALTY GAME!" Wizard shouted.

"What? NOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!" the lawyer shouted. Oh, the horror! What could the penalty game be doing to them?

They were feeling guilty! Every lawyer's worst nightmare come true!

"Well, that's over." Drez said. He looked at Wizard.

"Why did you bring The Powerpuff girls into this story anyway?" he said.

"I'm gonna destroy them." Wizard said. The ship suddenly rocked again, sending everyone to their feet.

"Awww, crap. I forgot about that thing." Wizard said.

"What are we gonna do?!?!" Badrick yelled.

"Well, I gotta run. Ciao!" Wizard shouted. He ran for the escape hatch, but Tea stopepd him.

"You're gonna help us. Understood?" she said.

"Fine! Just put me down! I'm afraid of heights!" Wizard shouted.
1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.title: It's not over yet...

choices: No, something else HAS to happen...
1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
(Since nobody is adding, I'll add! Wizard to the rescue!)

The sub rocked again, more violently. Wizard was curled in the fetal postion. "To the rescue, huh?" Drez asked.

"There's no place like home...There's no place like home...There's no place like home..." Wizard whispered.

"Nevermind him, we gotta kill whatever is out there!" Tea said.

"Gimme a blaster." Wizard said.

"I have a bad feeling about this..." Obi-Wan said.

"Why are all these Star Wars refrences coming into our story?!?!" Tea asked.

Wizard raised his hand. "The fourth wall has been breached. We can no longer control any of the other-place characters." he said.

"Huh?" Drez asked.

"We're now characters in the story. We can't do anything." Wizard said.

"Great. Just great..." Drez said.

"Um...guys?" Badrick said. A tiny crack was beginning to form into an even bigger crack.

"I know! There's too much weight on this sub! That's why the Opee Sea Killer is attacking us!" Wizard yelled.

"So, what do we do?" Tea asked. Wizard looked evily at the Powerpuffs.

"We have to get rid of some of the weight..." he said, pulling out a knife.

"What are you going to-" Drez began, but stopped.

"STABBITY DEATH!" Wizard yelled, flinging himself at the girls.

Wizard, of course, got killed. Again. Which relieved some of the weight on the sub.

"It was his insanity that held us down!" Drez said.

"And he's gone! Annoying little freak..." Buttercup mumbled.

Don't be so sure I'm gone. Now I'm the narrator! BWAHAHAHAHA! What should i do with my new-found power? Maybe I'll grab some doughnuts...

"Bah. All you can do is narrate!" Drez yelled.

But I can still annoy the heck outta you.

"Don't care!" Badrick yelled, "You're gone! YAY!!!"

Grrrr.....

Well, you could get the book...

Or I could just reset the whole adventure and make you have the book and put you back. Why the hell do we need the book anyway?

RESET!!!

We need a new storyline, STAT!

1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
Shadow flipped back his hood to reveal a man. He had short, dark hair and pale skin. His eyes were not normal, they shone red with some fiery passion, and yet they were also gaunt and lifeless. His face wasen't handsome, but wasen't ugly either.

"My name is Aldar. I have come from a far-off land to seek you, Yugi Moto. Or should I say...Pharaoh Yami?"

"What do you mean? I'm not a Pharaoh!" Yugi shouted, returning to Yugi Moto.

"It will be revealed soon enough." Aldar said. He walked over to Yugi and took two stars from off his wristband and dropped them into his hand.

"I believe these are yours. Take them. Once you realize your place in the world, I will be there. I will be there to cast you down. So, take heed." he said, walking off.

Yugi gaped. He had no idea what was going on. After a while, he put the stars on his wristband and walked off to find his friends.
1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.title: Shadows Revealed

1321112121121212122221111211212212122111.content:
Yugi walked off to find the others. While he walked, he thought about what Aldar had said. Pharoah Yami? Who was that? Yugi knew what a Pharoah was, of course. But why did Aldar call him a Pharoah?


"Because...I am a Pharoah" said a voice in Yugi's head.

"What?" asked Yugi aloud. The voice didn't reply.

"Oh great..." muttered Yugi. "I only hear that voice whenever I'm in a duel, and..."


He walked into something much bigger than him. Yugi startled and saw he was looking at the underside of a sneaker! The sneaker was perhaps 10 feet tall.

"Tea?" asked Yugi.

"Hi Yugi!" said Tea, turning to face him. "I won a duel!"

"Good for you" said Yugi. "I knew you could win"

Tea blushed.

"Who did you duel?" asked Yugi.

"A kid called Jeremy" said Tea. "he walked off when I defeated him. Spoils-sport"

Yugi grinned. Tea had improved after all the months that Yugi--and his grandfather--had taught Tea how to duel. Tea was a novice, at best, when Yugi had first met her.

"Where are the others?" asked Tea.

"Probably in duels" said Yugi.

"Right" said Tea.

1321112121121212122221112.content:
"Not for long." Kuviar growled.

"What?" Yugi asked in reflex.

Kuviar cast a spell on himself and immediately turned into a dark purple mist. The Kuviar mist flowed up in the air towards Tea until it reached her head. The mist immediately began to flow into her nose and a terrified Tea was not able to stop it, not even trying to cover her nostrils until the mist was already inside her.

"What the hell?!" Yugi yelled. "Tea, are you alright?

"I am, I'm just a little woo..."

Suddenly, Tea's eyes glew purple and her expression turned into one of malevolence.

"I feel just fine."

Tea swept downwards and grabbed Yugi, clutvhing him in her giant hand.

"Tea, what are you doing?" Yugi asked, terrified.

"I'm afraid that Tea isn't in charge anymore." Tea spoke,

"Kuviar?"

"Exactly, Yugi." Kuviar said, conmtrolling Tea. "Turning her evil and giving her orders wasn't enough, so mind control was the only other option to fullfil my plans..."

"What plan?" Yugi asked.

14.title: Lovely Mai

choices: Mai starts to grows right away
Mai slowly grows as she's walking
141.content:
A soft jingle sounded as the door opened in a dusty old card store where an old geezer was snoozing away. The patron walked to the counter and looked at the snoozing old man with a mixture of disgust and contempt. She tapped her foot several times in annoyance of having to wait, until she had finally had enough. She slammed her palms down on the counter creating a loud banging sound, the noise woke the old man immediately and he went tumbling to the ground.
“Gosh dang it! You young folks got no respect for ya elders,” He said in frustration from being woken. His anger dissipated when he got a good look at the person in front of him. A lecherous smile formed as he sized her up, long legs, big boobs and blond hair. This babe can wake him up any day of the week.
“Is there something I can help you with Ms…” He said, praying to God she wasn’t a Mrs.
“Mai is fine. I’m here because I heard from I reliable source that you have an extremely rare Dual Monsters card called the ‘Wishes’. I’d like to purchase this card.” Mai didn’t show it but inside she was smiling, this guy was the perfect pigeon.
“Ah, the wishes card, very rare indeed. Pegasus only made one card and I have it, you bet. Now I would normally charge 45,000,000 for the card but since I don’t see that many beautiful faces I’ll let it go for a measly 25,000,000.” He grinned showing all five of his yellow teeth, it took a lot of self-control for Mai not to retch at the sight.
“25,000,000 yen?” She said with a raised eyed brow.
“25,000,00 American dollars, but I am willing to bargain with you about alternative payment,” he corrected. Images flashed in his mind of how Mai would look after they had a concession. Mai nodded her head and thought long and hard about it. Then when she had thought of the pros and cons of the transaction she came to conclusion. She unbuttoned her top and pulled it aside flashing the old man. His eyes became as big as saucers and blood dripped from his nose. After a few seconds of showing off her fun bags, Mai closed her top before the old man busted a blood vessel.
“How does 100 yen sound to you?’ Mai said sweetly.
“Uhhhhh,” The old man drooled as he handed over the Wishes card. Mai happily plucked the card from his hand and handed 100 yen over then she trotted out of the store, a skip in her walk as she left. The old man remained frozen staring blankly at the spot where Mai had once stood; it would be an hour before he realized he had been ripped off.

Mai congratulated herself on making such a good deal, if only it was that easy to win a dual. Sure, before Dualist Kingdom she’d been know for using her sexuality to distract her opponents, but it had earned her a bad reputation. It drove her crazy the way that people spoke about her behind her back, she was known as a slut, a viewing good and a ho to all the professional dualists. That was why when she had gone to Dualist Kingdom she had sworn a vow of chastity; she would win without sleeping or sexually distracting her opponents. It had started off easily, but then she’d hit a snag, namely Joey Wheeler. God, she just wanted to jump his bones. He had that naïve brainless oaf look to him that was so endearing to Mai. She would love to turn that boy into a real man and why stop there? Yugi had his charms with his bright smile and warm eyes and when the Pharaoh came out, look out. Mai could just image that ancient royal banging her two weeks from Friday. Her urges for sex hadn’t dissolved even when she was under the control of the bastard Darts, only her fantasies back then involved chains, hot wax and a lot of whipping. But she couldn’t act like her old self now or everyone would go back to disrespecting her, everyone would label her another sluttish blond.
“I wish I could be myself, but still be seen as powerful and in command,” She said to herself as she walked home. Mai never noticed the Wishes card had started to glow
141.title: The true Mai

One teenager boy actually drooled at the sight of the growing beauty. Mai's clothes grew with her as she reached 20 feet tall and kept on growing. She looked in wonder at the people, now so small compared to her. Mai kept growing and growing until she was 200 feet tall. Her boots took up the entire street. Cars had crashed right into her long legs, but Mai felt no pain. She then noticed that the 'Wishes' card was glowing. As she looked, the card stopped glowing.
"My wish did this?" asked Mai, as she looked at her giant self. Then, a grin appeared on her face. Yes. She loved being in control, and being a giantess made her in control of a lot of things. She wondered how many wishes she had. The thought about making unlimited wishes made her excited. But, she wouldn't use another wish now. Now she can have some fun as a giantess for now. She placed the 'Wishes' card in her immense pocket and looked down. The teenage boy was still looking at Mai. All the other people around were either running away or looking at Mai.

“Meh, if they complain I’ll just wish that resurrected people have no memory about dieing.” With a renewed sense of wonder, Mai looked out at the city that would be her new realm. Everyone had left the street after she had first lumbered onto it in search of her friends. Not a soul was out and the only sound was coming from the distance where people still went on with their days unaware of the all mighty Goddess that had entered the picture. Mai was planning to break the news to them shortly.
“What to do now?” Mai pondered as she used a small building as a seat. Crushing in all its windows and leaving a massive butt impression on the roof. With all the power she had she could literally do anything. Turn the entire world into a bunch of willing slaves through a wish for mind control was one of Mai’s first ideas, but that one was quickly scrapped. If people lost their free will then what would be the point of being an all powerful Goddess? Sure, control was nice, but having a world of mindless zombies bowing was going to get old real quick.
After taking into account all the options, Mai came to the decision that she’d only use the Wishes card for growth and resurrection for now. Later she could have some real crazy fun, but for now being two hundred feet high was good enough.
“But what to do now?” Mai asked herself. In the distance, she could hear the busting metropolis; maybe it was time they got to meet the real Mai via a stomping spree. Then Mai saw the Kaiba Corp building a few blocks away, maybe scarring the bejesus out of Kaiba would be fun. As she weighed her options her stomach groaned as its contents emptied into her intestines. Mai looked down at her own body with a weird sense of absurdity, her body was absorbing her friends as she sat here.
“Don’t worry guys, after I’m done having fun I’ll bring you back,” Mai said even though her friends had been dead for over a minute.

"Yes. As you know, when an astroid hit our planet, only a few Sayians lived-the Sayians who were killing other natives. I was on Planet Namek, scouting to see what lifeforms lived there. I belive you've been there yourself-it was very...profitable." Ryan said.

"Very well. We'll talk later, once I'm in proper attire. meet me back here tommorrow." Vegeta said, flying off towards the hotel.

The Hotel...

"Another Sayian?!?! When will these people stopping showing up?!?! I suppose Funimation just wants us to keep having battles with them. Wait a sec...If Ryan was on Namek, he would have died...But when we made the wish to ressurect everyone killed by Frieza and his men, it would have ressurected all the Sayians...and possibly the planet itself, becuase the planet has some life force...That's it! That's gotta be why all the Sayians are coming back!" Vegeta yelled.

"Vegeta, shutup! I'm trying to relax!" Bulma shouted.

"Sorry..." Vegeta mumbled. He seemed to becoming less the bastard he used to be.
142222221212122221122.title: A Sayain Revelation

1422222212122.content:
As Ryan was groaning, a loud rumbling and a strange hunger grew from Mai's stomach. Suddenly, Mai's hand shot out towards the groaning psycho. Ryan could do nothing as the giantess' hand grabbed him by the collar and lifted him in the air. The strangest thought Mai eger had was surging through her mind. "On second thought, he does look tasty. Oh well, I guess it can't hurt to try. Ryan shot out of his trance, only to find himself face-to-face with a beautiful, but hungry giantess. For a few seconds, Ryan stared into Mai's eyes, becoming completely hypnotized by her beauty. He didn't even see Mai opening her mouth to take him in. "Here we go" was all that Mai said before she began what might change her life as a giantess forever.
         Ryan's eyes were so focused on Mai, making him easy for Mai to bring him close to her lips. A warm and humid gust blew into Ryan, breaking his spell. Rapidly turning his head a few times, he couldn't see the cause of the gust. It was only after a second burst that Ryan got a clue. Slowly turning his head, he realised his danger. Ryan was staring into the wide open mouth of a giantess; 'she was going to eat him!' Panic and terror raged in Ryan's body, but it was too late. Mai brought Ryan into her mouth up to his waist, then quickly closed her lips, going to suck him in. Mortal terror was dominating Ryan, as Mai slowly began sucking on his upper half, to prevent any escape attempt. All of Ryan's thrashing was starting to make Mai curious. 'I wonder what he tastes like. I hope he's as yummy as he looks!' So Mai rose her tongue to try and lick the flailing man in her mouth. Back in Ryan's point-of-view, he sees a large dark red mass slowly rising and moving towards his face. He begins to sweat profusely around his torso. His body starts to quiver and shake, when it finally happens. The tip of Mai's tongue touches Ryan's face. Ryan cannot help but scream at the top of his lungs, but this is not heard by anyone. All that anyone could hear was Mai's 'MMMMMMMMMMmmmmmmmmmmm' as she tasted Ryan's face. Mai is processing the taste for not even a fraction of a second when her conclusion was made. 'Delicious! Simply amazing! I feel I need more of him in me. I know I'm going to like this a lot!' With this thought, Mai began to suck harder on Ryan, to enjoy his taste AND to satisfy her strange hunger.
         Back at Ryan's point-of-view Mai's sucking increased, making it both hard for him to breathe, and causing a lot of his blood to stop flowing. After fifteen seconds of this torment, Ryan finally passed out, this would be the last thing he would ever do. Mai sensed the was done, and moved her tongue under Ryan's upper half, savoring his taste and moving further down the unconscious psycho's body, eventually reaching his feet. Mai then hooked her tongue and brought the motionless, but still alive body, completely into her mouth, and closed it, the taste in her mouth made Mai moan in delight. Mai then began working her tongue around Ryan's body, tossing it and turning it to enjoy the full flavor. Mai was a minute and a half into her enjoyment when her stomach growled, demanding her to swallow her captive. Feeling that she worked her little morsel over quite well, Mai swallowed Ryan, and enjoyed the feeling of him sliding down her throat. Mai could feel every bit of Ryan's little trip, ending with a plop, indicating that Ryan was now in her belly. Mai gasped in delight and placed her hand on her slightly bloated tummy, satisfied. A small bubble exited her stomach, and Mai let out a long, but delicate burp, followed by an innocent giggle The guys watched in amazement, desire, and in some extent, lust, while Brian felt as if his heart would shoot out of his chest. Inside of Mai's tummy, small amounts of acid came oozing out of her stomach, and the walls began to move, letting out a loud gurgling, a little sloshing and a few 'blorps' as the digestion process had started on the once feared lunatic.
         In the midst of Mai's bodily orchestra she patted her tummy and proceeded to lay down in the nice warm sunlight. "It's alright if i take a nap now, right?" Almost completely speechless, all the guys could do was nod and say "Uh-huh." Mai was smiling, replying, "Thanks guys!" so Mai took care to lay down gently and silently (excluding the sounds of Mai digesting the 9/10's of what was Ryan the maniac), put on hand on her tummy, rubbing it, and the other under her head. Mai then closed her eyes and dozed off. The guys then walked over to Mai and began to cuddle with her. Yugi was on her stomach, Joey was on her chest, Mokuba was using her hair as a makeshift blanket, while the others used her hips for shade. Brian was being a little kinky, resting on her crotch. If paradise was a dream to many, these young men found it on a giantess' body, and they never wanted to wake if it was as it was said to be. But, on the contrary, this paradise they have is a reality that they only dreamed of.
1422222212122.title: Can't hurt to try

1542222.content:
"Ohhh" Moaned a little girl, she was looking at a card known as "Injection Fairy Lily."

Her greatest card that took her out of many awful predicaments in the past, but something about the card just didn't settle with her directly...

"Injection Fairy Lily, your abilities are used best when your in a sudden disposition to lose a duel," she sighed, " don't get me wrong, your a cute fairy and all... but paying 2000 points for a single try at 3000 attack points, can seriously wear out someone's luck."

She looked at her card for a lengthy period of time... then thought to herself: "I would be so wonderful, if you could be powerful in and all by yourself... sadly, I'll never get that wish... otherwise, I would've beaten someone like Yugi Moto, or even Jaden Yugi first hand."

An hour past...

The young lady feel asleep.

She then started dreaming about a tournament that she wanted to participate in, but couldn't due to her late arrival.

"Cool!! It the very tornament that Yugi and Kaiba fought agianst Marik two years ago... what was that tornament? Oh forget it."

She was too excited to see the matches first hand.

"Due to a falter of an inconvinence... Mr. Kaiba will now be resigning off the tournaments toward a next contender in the following... thus, now making this a triple-threat elimination rules match, in which tyhe winner will get everything they deserve most."

The young lady stood her ground to see the two contenders that were planing to make an impact.

"First contender... Yugi Moto..." The crowd cheered rentlessly.

"The second contender... Marik from Egypt..." once more the crowd was becoming excited.

"What about the third?!" The young lady got real angsty, at the mere thought of the third contender.

A few minutes go by...

"Since no one else plans to take the seat to the absence of Mr. Seto Kaiba, I'm now demeaning match to be one on..."

"Wait!! I want in!!"

"Who are you little girl?"

"I'm Carrina Moeis. I'm 17, and I wish to be part of this tournament feature."

"Than it's settled... Yugi Moto, Marik, and Carrina Moeis... Let's begin the final sudden death elimination!!" The crowd cheered even louder this time.

They were all getting to see an unexpected match.

Moments later...

Marik had 3200 points to go, Yugi was at a close 3500, and poor Carrina... she was about to be eliminated with a mere 600 points left.

"Now Ra... eliminate the girl, so that I may get one step closer to Yugi and the Millenium Puzzle!!"

The firey monster was about to unleash a devastaing blow to a barely intact Carrina.

"Not so fast Marik!!" Yugi made a call that saved Carrina from total destruction...

"Negate Attack!!" Marik stood in shock. "But why?!"

"I'll be the one to eliminate you... anyway, have you ever wondered what she has under that face-down card?" Yugi responded, as he pointed to a face-down card that Carrina placed earlier.

Underneath the side was a card that could've sealed Marik's fate closed... "Angel Sanctuary" A card that was more than capable to protect her life points, at the time that Ra was about to attack.

Marik wondered what that card was for himself, and why she placed it there...

"Is she trying to protect her life points? NO she's almost out of cards to do so... a monster can be a diffrence though, but which?"

"Alright Marik... MY TURN!!" Yugi took out a card that also plan to threaten both Marik and Carrina.

"Dark Magician... Attack Ra now, while he's weakened."

Dark Magician attacks, and he secures a victory over the first to be eliminated: Marik.

He didn't riled himself complaining, he felt relieved... more than complaciant.

Marik then walks to Carrina's corner.

"You got the card that can finish little Yugi... what is that card that you were trying so hard to protect?"

"Injection Fairy Lily."

"WHAT?! You're trying to use a card such as that?! You could've down right eliminated us then and there... Oh, I see." Marik laughed.

As he then took his steps to the outside exit, he mentioned some final words to young Carrina.

"You got some serious potential there... you and Fairy of yours, I wouldn't waste it on little Yugi here, go ahead... and unlock that... POTENTIAL!!"

Carrina woke up from that dream.... she then felt something warm, and pillowy...

She looked upward, and in a suuden appearence... there she was... a giantess in the form of "Injection Fairy Lily."

"My fairy..."

"Yes, I'm here, and I'm more powerful that anything your dreams could wish for... why do you think they restricted my power?!"

"Re-restriced?"

"Yeah, now it's time to have some real fun." Giggled the Fairy Lily...

Excited as she was, she didn't knew what to do.

Injection Fairy Lily on the other hand had two to go for...
1542222.title: A fairy with a sense of dominance.

info.description:
Characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! show grow to gigantic size!

RULES

1)PLEASE USE THE ENGLISH NAMES since I have only watched the dubbed show on Kids' WB! Do not scorn me for this

2) There can be stomping, eating, etc. Just don't be too graphic.

3) Do not make them miles high. Let's keep this a little realistic. It's alright if it's the last chapter though.

12/24 UPDATE: Toliet Stuff is allowed, but don't dwell on it

5) No gay stuff!

6) There can be more than one Giant/Giantess in a thread.

7) There can be giant Duel Monsters too! Just make sure they're a "people" monster...like Dark Magician.

UPDATE: I have noticed a lot of views but not enough additions. Please add some additions. Just don't make lousy one-lined chapters please.

10/22 UPDATE: YU-GI-OH GX characters are allowed
